title: imac 21 mid 2011
message: when switching to solid state hard disk the fan fires, it is possible to remove this sound.What alternatives are there only to place an owc brand sensor?or you can make a modification on the board?

title: imac 21 mid 2011
message:
Do you plan to throw the money into that bulshit?
Don't you think is better to read the forum DAILY and take notes when you detect some intersting information?
[URL unfurl="true"]https://boards.rossmanngroup.com/threads/a1311-old-imac-with-frequent-wait-cursor-sbbod.61553/[/URL]
That was a really recent thread...

No problem if you prefer to ask and wait replies ONLY when you need something.
Each one spend his time how he likes.
Other people consider being better to gather information and save it.
